# Bolivia Blue Dollar Calculator & Exchange Rate

> This project provides a web-based calculator to compare official and "Blue Dollar" exchange rates in Bolivia. It helps travelers decide whether to use cash, credit cards, or money transfer apps.

## Documentation

- [README](README.md): Project overview, setup instructions, and structure.

## Source Code

- [Main Logic](js/app.js): Frontend JavaScript logic for the calculator.
- [Service Worker](sw.js): Service Worker for offline capabilities.
- [Scraper](scripts/scraper.py): Python script used to fetch the latest street exchange rates and official rates.
- [Data](data/rates.json): JSON file storing the latest exchange rates used by the application.
- [HTML](index.html): The main entry point for the web application.
